word:
"Calling these disciples together, Christ gave them their commission: . . . 'And as ye go, preach, saying, The kingdom of God is at hand. Heal the sick, cleanse the lepers, raise the dead, cast our devils: freely ye have received, freely give.' . . . 'Behold I send you forth as sheep 


                                             15 

in the midst of wolves: be ye therefore wise as serpents and harmless as doves.'
